title: Update service galleries: remove Full Interior Fit-outs images and add Carpet Installation images

requirements.text: Remove the existing gallery images from the 'Full Interior Fit-outs' service section so that the service shows the empty-gallery placeholder ('Gallery images coming soon...') instead of thumbnails.

quotes: remove previous images of  'full interior fit-outs'  service we will then add images in that section

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts` no longer contains any `GalleryItem` entries with `category: 'full-interior'`.
On the Services page, the 'Full Interior Fit-outs' service section renders the empty-gallery placeholder block from `MediaStrip` (no thumbnails).

requirements.text: Add the 6 uploaded images as static frontend assets and register them as gallery media items for a new 'carpet' category used by the additional offering 'Carpet Installation'. Uploaded files to add: `carpet4.jpeg`, `carpet2.jpeg`, `carpet1.jpeg`, `carpet3.jpeg`, `carpet1.1.jpeg`, `Screenshot 2026-02-12 215137.png`.

quotes: add this attached images to this additional service   carpet service

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 uploaded image files are present under `frontend/public/assets/` (preserve filenames exactly, including spaces and punctuation).

`frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts` includes 6 new `GalleryItem` entries (type `image`) that reference the new assets via `path: 'assets/<filename>'` and share a single, consistent category string for carpet (e.g., `carpet-installation`).
No existing gallery categories are broken (other service galleries still load their images).

requirements.text: Update the 'Additional Offerings' UI so that the 'Carpet Installation' offering displays a thumbnail grid of the new carpet images (reusing the existing `MediaStrip` component).

quotes: add this attached images to this additional service   carpet service

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Additional Offerings' card for 'Carpet Installation' shows a `MediaStrip` directly within/under the offering content, rendering up to 4 thumbnails (consistent with current `MediaStrip` default behavior).
Other additional offerings (Roller Blinds, Vertical Blinds, Parquet Flooring) remain unchanged and do not show a media strip.
No console errors occur due to missing categories/paths when visiting the Services page.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (shadcn components).
Do not modify files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all backend logic unchanged; this update is content/UI-only.
nonGoals: Adding new backend APIs or storing images in the backend canister.
Adding images for other additional offerings besides 'Carpet Installation'.
Creating or editing generated images; use the user-uploaded images as-is.
